name: 2014 Men's BOCO AT Neutral All Terrain Trainer
description: Born in Boulder, Colorado, the BOCO AT brings you a piece of the Colorado Mountains wherever your run takes you. The light and level 3mm drop, and multi-directional lugs, will keep you rocking out on even the rockiest of trails. While the landscape may change, the familiar Newton feeling remains the same. Rain, snow, hail and spilled coffee are no match for the durable all-weather upper. It is time to take your Newtons over the river and through the woods. - See more at: Newton BOCO AT vid.

name:
2013 Women's Gravity
Neutral Performance Trainer
description: This Neutral Performance Trainer is for runners wanting a daily training shoe that can also function brilliantly as a faster tempo-pace run or race shoe. More supportive and structured than the lightweight performance trainer line, the Gravity is a great everyday trainer for runners who may like to turn up the speed now and again during tempo or fast-paced runs and intervals.

name:
2013 Women's Motion
Stability Performance Trainer
description: This Stability Performance Trainer is for runners wanting a daily training shoe that can also function brilliantly as a faster tempo-pace run or race shoe. More supportive and structured than the lightweight performance trainer line, the Motion is a great everyday trainer for runners who may like to turn up the speed now and again during tempo or fast-paced runs and intervals. The Motion has medial posting to offset pronation.

name:
2013 Women's Distance
Neutral Performance Trainer
description: The Distance line offers lightweight performance products crafted for fast-paced running. Because the lightweight neutral performance trainer is designed for speed, more-efficient runners will enjoy it for both regular everyday training and racing. This model is also a great choice for runners seeking a shoe for short- or mid-distance racing and weekly speed workouts.

name:
2013 Women's Distance U
Stability Performance Trainer
description: The Distance line offers lightweight performance products crafted for fast-paced running. Because the lightweight neutral performance trainer is designed for speed, more-efficient runners will enjoy it for both regular everyday training and racing. This model is also a great choice for runners seeking a shoe for short- or mid-distance racing and weekly speed workouts. Universal posting will accommodate a neutral or pronating foot.

2013 Men's Gravity

description: This Neutral Performance Trainer is for runners wanting a daily training shoe that can also function brilliantly as a faster tempo-pace run or race shoe. More supportive and structured than the lightweight performance trainer line, the Gravity is a great everyday trainer for runners who may like to turn up the speed now and again during tempo or fast-paced runs and intervals.

2013 Men's Distance S
Stability Performance Trainer
description: The Distance line offers lightweight performance products crafted for fast-paced running. Because the lightweight stability performance trainer is designed for speed, more-efficient runners will enjoy it for both regular everyday training and racing. This model is also a great choice for runners seeking a shoe for short- or mid-distance racing and weekly speed workouts. Medial posting offsets pronation.

name: Men's Altra Instinct 1.5
description:
An upgrade from the original award-winning shoe, The Instinct™ is the first shoe to truly marry the form-improving benefits of a minimalist shoe with the comfort, cushioning and support of a traditional running shoe. The Zero Drop™ platform and innovative foot-shaped design work together to help runners maintain proper running technique and reduce joint impact while freeing their toes to help alleviate foot pain. Trust your instincts and experience the world’s first fully cushioned, foot-shaped, Zero Drop™ running shoe. Technical Stuff
  • Zero Drop™ Platform
  • Weight: 8.9 oz
  • Midsole: 12mm; Dual Layer EVA with A-Bound Top Layer
  • Outsole: 4.5 mm FootPod Outsole
  • Cushioning: 12mm; Dual Layer EVA with A-Bound Top Layer
  • Total Stack Height: 22mm
  • 2 included insoles: 5mm Sculpted and 3mm Strengthen
  • Upper: Quick Dry Air Mesh
  • Liner: Full Length Seamless inner lining with Premium Drilex Collar
  • Lining
  • Asymmetric Lacing
  • Other Features: Zero Drop™ with Full Cushioning Innovative, Foot-Shaped Design Male specific fit

name: Women's Altra Intuition 1.5
description:
Designed specifically for women, The Intuition™ 1.5 isn’t just another shrink it and pink it shoe. From the amount of cushioning to shape of the shoe, this shoe is 100% female-specific. Plus, with the Zero Drop™ platform and innovative foot-shaped design this shoe delivers many of the benefits of barefoot running with the comfort, cushioning and support that distance runners love. Follow your intuition and experience the world’s first fully cushioned, foot-shaped, Zero Drop™ running shoe. Technical Stuff
  • ZeroDrop™ Platform with Full Cushioning
  • Weight: 7.7oz
  • Midsole: 12mm; Dual Layer EVA with A-Bound Top Layer
  • Outsole: 4.5 mm FootPod Outsole
  • Total Stack Height: 22mm
  • 2 included insoles: 5mm Sculpted and 3mm Strengthen
  • Upper: Quick Dry Air Mesh
  • Liner: Full Length Seamless inner lining with Premium Drilex Collar Lining
  • Asymmetric Lacing
  • Other Features: Innovative Foot-Shaped Design, Female-Specific Design

name: Men's Altra Superior
description:
Run any trail with The Superior™, Altra's newest lightweight performance off road shoe. The foot-shaped design provides for maximum foot relaxation and speed, while the Zero Drop™ platform gives you stabilization and better form. Get rugged protection from a lightweight shoe with removable StoneGuard™ rock protection system. The Superior™ also features a CheckerTrail outsole for maximum grip and a two-layer midsole with A-Bound for maximum energy return. Take on the terrain with an inspired trail running shoe. Technical Stuff
  • Ideal Uses: Trail Running, Hiking, Fastpacking
  • Designed to Reduce: Running Slow on the Trail
  • Platform: Zero Drop™ Platform
  • Weight: 7.9oz
  • Midsole: Two-Layer EVA / A-Bound™
  • Outsole: CheckerTrail Outsole
  • Insole: Contoured
  • Upper: Quick Dry Trail Mesh
  • Lacing Structure: Asymmetric
  • Other Features: Removable StoneGuard Rock Protection, Foot-Shaped Design

name: Women's Altra Superior
description:
Head for the hills in the The Superior™, the performance trail shoe designed specifically for women. With a Zero Drop™ platform for stabilization and foot-shaped design for speed, you can hit the trail with confidence and comfort. The Checker Trail sticky rubber outsole offers superior grip. Don't let its lightweight feel fool you – the removable StoneGuard™ rock protection system protects your feet. Get rugged stability with a refined fit, whether you run to win or hike for fun. Technical Stuff
  • Ideal Uses: Trail Running, Hiking, Fastpacking
  • Designed to Reduce: Running Slow on the Trail
  • Platform: Zero Drop™ Platform
  • Weight: 6.9oz
  • Midsole: Two-Layer EVA / A-Bound™
  • Outsole: Checker Trail Outsole
  • Insole: StoneGuard™
  • Upper: Quick Dry Trail Mesh
  • Lacing Structure: Asymmetric
  • Other Features: Removable StoneGuard Rock Protection, Foot-Shaped Design

name: Run MSP Hoodie (Navy)
description:
Celebrate our thriving running community in the Twin Cities in comfort and style with our Run MSP casual wear. This classic style hoodie is made with the super-soft and natural Eco-Fleece. It features a drawstring hood and kangaroo front pocket.

We print all the Run MSP apparel with the highest quality and environmentally friendly water-based inks.

description:

name: Run MSP T-shirt (Heather Grey)
description:
Celebrate our thriving running community in comfort and style with our Run MSP casual wear. These soft and comfortable t-shirts capture the same vintage look of your old-school P.E. tee with added eco-friendly appeal. Features a bound collar and blind stitching on the sleeves and hem. 

Unisex regular fit. Women typically buy a size smaller than usual, while men generally buy the same size or one size larger.

name: Twin Cities Track Club Phy Ed T-Shirt
description:
The Twin Cities Track Club t-shirts capture the same vintage look as your old phys ed t-shirt. Super soft and comfortable Eco-heather tee that features a bound collar and blind stitching on the sleeves and hem.

Unisex regular fit. Women typically buy a size smaller than usual, while men generally buy the same size or one size larger.

name:
Twin Cities Track Club Hoodie
(Navy)
description: Rep the Twin Cities in comfort and style with this classic style hoodie. Made with the super-soft and natural Eco-Fleece. It features a drawstring hood and kangaroo front pocket. All Twin Cities Track Club apparel is printed with the highest quality and environmentally friendly water-based inks. Regular Unisex sizing. Women typically order a size down and men order the same size of a size larger for a more relaxed fit.

name: Knuckle Lights
description:
Our top selling light & visibility accessory! Knuckle Lights is the first and only light designed specifically to be worn on your hands. They are positioned to light the path in front of you while increasing your visibility to other pedestrians and traffic. 

The newest edition features two brightness settings and a blinking flash. They are also available in five color options - black, silver, yellow, pink, and blue.
